thread.title: White House approved California emergency funding | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: White House approved California emergency funding | Daily Mail Online

author: Jennifer Smith
title: White House approved California emergency funding | Daily Mail Online
text: White House FINALLY approves emergency aid funding for California dam amid the return home of thousands of evacuees despite more storms looming ahead The White House has reportedly approved the California Governor's request for emergency funding Evacuation order for Butte, Sutter and Yuba counties was lifted dramatically on Tuesday afternoon Officials say enough repairs have been done to secure an emergency spillway at the Oroville Dam They also say they can drain enough water from reservoir above the dam before storms hit at weekend This means they will not even need to use the emergency spillway which threatened floods on Saturday Despite lifting the evacuation order, they are telling 200,000 displaced people they may reissue it later Evacuees fled suddenly on Sunday after being told they had an hour before the emergency spillway collapsed Published: 00:35 GMT, 15 February 2017 | Updated: 02:42 GMT, 15 February 2017 19 shares
